text: Giovanni Battista Barducci (died 1661) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of San Miniato (1656–1661). (in Latin) ==Biography== On 17 Jun 1656, Giovanni Battista Barducci was appointed during the papacy of Pope Alexander VII as Bishop of San Miniato. He served as Bishop of San Miniato until his death on 17 Sep 1661. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Alexander VII Category:1661 deaths
title: Giovanni Battista Barducci
